data.title: Futurama/A Bicyclops Built for Two
data.text:
This article about an episode needs to be expanded with more information.

Please help out by editing it.

A Bicyclops Built for Two is the thirteenth episode of the second season of Futurama, and the twenty-second episode overall.

Contents

1 Plot Overview

2 Notes

3 Arc Advancement

3.1 Happenings

3.2 Characters

3.3 Referbacks

4 Trivia

4.1 The Show

4.2 Behind the Scenes

4.3 Allusions and References

4.4 Memorable Moments

5 Quotes

6 Reviews

Plot Overview

While strolling through the Internet,Leela meets,and becomes attrated to what she believes is another Cyclops,a male version.They meet,talk some,but befor they can get better aqainted,Fry interupts their potential bonding.Later on however,the male Cyclops had managed to get Leela's E-Mail Address,and asks if he could meet her in person.He gives his Home Address on a nearby Planet.Leela heads straight for the Planet.Fry,and Bender accompany her.They arrive on what looks to be a deserted Planet except for some Giant Statues all one-eyed versions of famous people.Bender starts looting the Jewels from these Statues.The Male Cyclop is name Algenan.He gives Leela a history of the Planets existence.Algenan tells L;eela that he is the last surviving member of he,and Leela's race.He wants to repopulate the Cyclop race.He asks Leela to marry him.She bearly hesitates,and says Yes.Both are happy,and make plans for thye Nuptials.Fry however is not happy at all.Not because of his love for Leela,but because there is something about Algenan that isn't right.He tries to tell Leela,but Leela is too happy to listen.Fry preceeds to search Algenans Planet,and will find the Answer.His findings will put a stop to the Wedding.Bender in the meantime will continue to loot jewels,and other valuables from the Planet.

Notes

This episode pays some Homage to Fox Networks "Married...with Children,a Serie which Katey Sagel was one of the Stars.

Arc Advancement

Happenings

The Planet Express Crew all enter into the Internet to meet new people,and play Games.

Characters

Fry,Leela,Bender,Amy,Zoidberg,The Professor,Algenan.

Referbacks

Trivia

The Show

Behind the Scenes

Allusions and References

Algenan tells Leela the made-up Story of their Planets History.One part tells of a one-eyed Baby Girl being launched in a small Rocket Ship heading towards Earth.

Memorable Moments

Leela styling her hair ala Peggy Bundy style to please Algenan.Bender looting.The Brides of Algenan showing up at his,and Leela's Wedding thanks to Fry.
